rooms.description: A small foyer connecting the entrance to the main living space, with built-in storage.
Open-plan design combining the living area and kitchen. The layout emphasizes minimalism with streamlined cabinetry and open shelving, ensuring ample natural light.
A minimalist guest bedroom featuring a private balcony to enhance Vastu compliance by providing fresh air and sunlight.
Spacious master bedroom with an attached balcony for relaxation, designed with ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with Vastu principles.
Minimalist bedroom layout that includes a balcony to ensure proper sunlight and airflow, aligned with Vastu norms.

openings.description: Provides access from the exterior into the entrance hall. Complies with local building norms for security and accessibility.
Large window openings designed to maximize natural light, in adherence to Vastu principles emphasizing east or south orientation.
Provides access from each bedroom to its private balcony, ensuring that the room benefits from sunlight and proper ventilation.
